name: ActivityWatch
title: activitywatch.net
shortDescription: ActivityWatch is an open-source, privacy-first time tracking application that runs on multiple platforms including Windows, macOS, Linux, and Android. It helps users monitor productivity, manage screen habits, and track time spent on various projects. Ideal for individuals looking to gain insights into their digital habits, it serves as a useful tool for both personal self-awareness and professional productivity management.
